scripts.build.min: npm run clean && npx cross-env min=true node esbuild.js
scripts.xform.umd: npx babel dist/cydran.js --out-file dist/cydran_umd.js && npx babel dist/cydran.min.js --minified --out-file dist/cydran.min_umd.js
scripts.build.release: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run validate && npm run test.coverage && npm run test.integration && npm run build.min
scripts.build.all: npm run build.release && npm run docs
scripts.release.patch: npm version patch && npm run orchestrate.release
scripts.release.minor: npm version minor && npm run orchestrate.release
scripts.release.major: npm version major && npm run orchestrate.release
scripts.orchestrate.release: npm run build.release && npm pack && npm run publish.release
scripts.publish.release: git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish
scripts.graph.project: npx rimraf md_docs/projgraph.jpg && npx depcruise --validate --exclude "(spec|^node_modules)" .dependency-cruiser.js --include-only '^src' --output-type dot src | dot -T jpg > md_docs/projgraph.jpg
scripts.docs: npx rimraf docs && npm run graph.project && npx typedoc --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json ./src
